lead_paragraph: Houston Texans (4-2)at Indianapolis Colts (4-2)8:30 p.m. Eastern, ESPNLine: Colts by 5.5
snippet: The Colts must overcome multiple injuries to avoid a first-ever sweep at the hands of the Texans.

headline.main: Monday Night Matchup: Texans at Colts

abstract: The Colts must overcome multiple injuries to avoid a first-ever sweep at the hands of the Texans.
